attributes.description: Dashboard to investigate relevant event logs and statistics related to beaconing activity.

There are four beaconing indicators:

- Low Frequency: Periodicity of the beacon is > 1 minute
- High Frequency: Periodicity of the beacon is <= 1 minute
- Low Source Bytes Variation: The beacons have low variation in bytes sent from source
- Low Destination Bytes Variation: The beacons have low variation in bytes sent from
